css: .cover-agentur-potenzial-section { padding: 6rem 0; background-color: var(--color-light, #FFFFFF); } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .container { width: 90%; max-width: 1000px; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .hero-content { max-width: 700px; margin: 0 auto 3rem; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .pre-title { font-size: 0.9rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--color-secondary, #6B7280); margin-bottom: 1rem; display: inline-block; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section h1 { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 6vw, 4rem); font-weight: 700; color: var(--color-dark, #1F2937); line-height: 1.2; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .subtitle { font-size: 1.1rem; color: var(--color-secondary, #6B7280); margin: 0 auto 2.5rem; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .btn-dark { display: inline-block; padding: 0.8rem 2.5rem; background-color: var(--color-dark, #1F2937); color: var(--color-light, #FFFFFF); border-radius: 0.5rem; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .image-wrapper img { width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 500px; object-fit: cover; border-radius: 1.5rem; box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .anim-delay-1 { transition-delay: 0.1s; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .anim-delay-2 { transition-delay: 0.2s; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .anim-delay-3 { transition-delay: 0.3s; } .cover-agentur-potenzial-section .anim-delay-4 { transition-delay: 0.4s; }

de.name: Agentur Potenzial
de.title: Entfalte das Potenzial deiner Agentur.
de.subtitle: Moderne Designs lieben weiche, abgerundete Ecken, große, schöne Bilder und diesen leichten, 'luftigen' Vibe. Und rate mal? Genau so sind die Onepage-Sektionen aufgebaut!

en.name: Agency Potential
en.title: Unleash your agency's potential.
en.subtitle: Modern designs love soft, rounded corners, large, beautiful images, and that light, 'airy' vibe. And guess what? That's exactly how Onepage sections are built!
en.image_alt: Modern agency office with team collaboration

ar.name: إمكانات الوكالة
ar.title: أطلق العنان لإمكانيات وكالتك.
ar.subtitle: تحب التصاميم الحديثة الزوايا الناعمة والمستديرة والصور الكبيرة والجميلة وهذا الشعور الخفيف 'المنعش'. وخمن ماذا؟ هذه هي الطريقة التي تم بها بناء أقسام Onepage!
ar.image_alt: مكتب وكالة حديث مع تعاون الفريق
